      • getDiskCacheDir

        public static DiskFileUtils.CacheDirInfo getDiskCacheDir(android.content.Context context,
                                         java.lang.String uniqueName,
                                         long requireSpace)
        Get a usable cache directory (external if available, internal otherwise). . Check if media is mounted or storage is built-in, if so, try and use external cache folder otherwise use internal cache folder . If both of them can not meet the requirement, use the bigger one.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use
        uniqueName - A unique folder name to append to the cache folder
        Returns:
        The cache folder

      • getExternalCacheDir

        public static java.io.File getExternalCacheDir(android.content.Context context)
        Get the external application cache directory.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use
        Returns:
        The external cache folder : /storage/sdcard0/Android/data/com.srain.sdk/cache

      • getUsableSpace

        public static long getUsableSpace(java.io.File path)
        Check how much usable space is available at a given path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to check
        Returns:
        The space available in bytes by user, not by root, -1 means path is null, 0 means path is not exist.

      • getUsedSpace
